import React from 'react' import { Typography, Divider, Grid } from '@mui/material' import { styled } from '@mui/material/styles' import Paper from '@mui/material/Paper' import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles' import Card from '@material-ui/core/Card' import CardContent from '@material-ui/core/CardContent' import CardMedia from '@material-ui/core/CardMedia' const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ root: { display: 'flex', backgroundColor: '#ECF2FF', maxWidth: 540, }, media: { width: 160, height: 160, margin: theme.spacing(1), borderRadius: '50%', }, content: { display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', justifyContent: 'center', }, })) // const Item = styled(Paper)(({ theme }) => ({ // backgroundColor: theme.palette.mode === 'dark' ? '#1A2027' : '#fff', // ...theme.typography.body2, // padding: theme.spacing(1), // textAlign: 'center', // color: theme.palette.text.secondary, // })) const Description = () => { const classes = useStyles() return ( <> About me Developpeur Full Stack passionnée par l’univer du web et dotée d’une curiosité pour cette metier.Polyvalent et forte de 2 ans d’experience, je me suis spécialisée dans le developpement frontend ansi que le backend. Je suis spécialisée sur les frameworks React, php et nodejs. what i do!
Backend Development Create APIs with Node.js and PHP framework using the concept of micro-service system. More than 2 years of experience in this domain "Industry 4.7"
item2 {/* 2 */} item3 {/* 3 */} item4{/* 4 */} ) } export default Description
